document_data.name: Temples Plague
document_data.mainbody: The '''Temples Plague''' was a [[disease]] that struck [[Calimshan]] and [[Tashalar]] in the {{YearlinkName|-676}}.
document_data.Acquisition: The disease was spread via touch with an infected individual, even if they were unaware that they were infected.
document_data.Effects: It caused fever and accumulation of fluid in the lungs.
document_data.History:
The disease was concentrated in [[Almraiven]], [[Calimport]], and the cities of Tashalar. It led to the deaths of about 7% of the population across these regions, although Calimport fared slightly better with a casualty rate of 5%.

The disease was unknowingly spread by [[priest]]s, which was how it gained its moniker of the "Temples Plague".
